LOG_LEVEL.description: Logger base level. Default is INFO

PY_ENV.description: Bot running in production or development. Default is production

BOT_CLIENT_ID.description: Look at from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. Reddit app client id. 14 character length. Default is empty

BOT_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Look at from https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps. Reddit app client secret. 27 character length. Default is empty

BOT_PASSWORD.description: Reddit bot account password. Default is filler text

BOT_USERAGENT.description: If you use environment variables must set True. Default is filler text

BOT_USERNAME.description: Reddit bot account username(without u/). Like a BotName. Default is filler text

BOT_ACTIVE_SUBREDDIT.description: Subreddit where the bot will run(without r/). Default is filler text
